name: Color Cubes: Karaa Kyubusu
description:
Help Karaa bring peace and order back in space by finding the odd cubes. 
Pop the odd cube with the different color among a jolly set of cubes to earn points!

Be careful not to tap the wrong cube as you will be penalized for it. 

* Share your high score and show off your best to your friends
* Compare your score with other friends through leaderboards
